examples: speaks five languages … but deprecates this facility
the most reluctantly admired and least easily deprecated of … novelists

definition: to withdraw official support for or discourage the use of (something, such as a software product) in favor of a newer or better alternative
examples: … the Google Drive app for PC and Mac is officially being deprecated and the company's developers announced in a blog post that it will no longer be supported starting December 11. Instead, you'll need to choose from one of two new apps.
In the case of the Windows 10 Fall Creators Update, Microsoft is deprecating and removing more than 20 features.
deprecate the wrath … of the Roman people

definition: to pray against (something, such as an evil)
